Text:
Thanks.
This is an excellent software but it only works for a couple of days. Then suddenly it starts inserting watermarks into pdf files when you create a pdf file or when you add or remove pages from an existing one. 
I tried several things:
There is a folder called: C:Program FilesTracker SoftwareLive Update. I removed the file LiveUpdate.exe from it. After a few days the file appears there and the watermarks appear. 
Next I blocked the LiveUpdate.exe with firewall. Still the problem appeared again after a few days.
Can anybody help me with this?
